thread.title: Michael W
thread.title_full: www.lanieri.com recensione scritta da Michael W

author: Michael W
title: Michael W
text: If it's convenient for you, I suggest any customer should come in to their store to take the measurement. At least I did terribly in taking my sizes for my first order. But after I took the measurement at their store, the second order came in perfect in sizing, and i even made some special requests in that order. They are wonderful. I can imagine myself ordering all my work suits from them over the next decade.
